channel.title: ❖ Cracked ❖ HostilityMinecraft - HardcorePVP ❖ Grief, raid and steal ❖ 24/7 ❖
channel.description:
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-= ❖HardcorePVP Server IP: PVP.HostilityMC.net
❖Prison Server IP: Empire.HostilityMC.net
❖Hunger Games Server IP: HG.HostilityMC.net
❖Website URL: [Dear Visitor, you're restricted from viewing links until you are registered & logged on. Click Here To Register Today!
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
** 18/5/2012: Added grenades, guns and cannons for donators! ** Are you looking for that *unique* Hardcore PVP and cracked server? Well, if you do, you'll be served! You'll be able to come and fight along with other players in the nolagg beta stage of our server!
You'll be stunned by our spawn, our minigame park an our Staff team's energy! Also, donations will earn you a rank with the appropriate privileges depending on the amount you donated. DISCOUNTS IN BETA!
We uses the most recent plugin to detect griefs and... Wait... NO! Griefing is allowed!
Altough, we use the most wanted plugins by Hardcore PVP'ers. Factions and MCmmo are on of them.
Come on, come take a look!
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
❖HardcorePVP Server IP: PVP.HostilityMC.net
❖Prison Server IP: Empire.HostilityMC.net
❖Hunger Games Server IP: HG.HostilityMC.net
❖Website URL: [Dear Visitor, you're restricted from viewing links until you are registered & logged on. Click Here To Register Today!
